title: Hey GD, I need a spot of internet usage help
body:
Long story short, I moved to my new position with the National Park Service and expected to have minimal internet but ended up with none.  How they can expect me to complete online training courses with no internet, I have no clue, but I have managed to snag a mobile hotspot to try to satisfy my greater internet needs.

Here's where I need the spot of help -- how much data should I pick up?  I plan to use it for e-mail, streaming stuff like LCS and watching YouTube for a few hours in the evening, Skype/Curse, and hopefully League for like an hour or so a night.  Does anyone know how much data each requires?  I haven't found a definitive answer, especially to League.  The guy at the store told me 3 GB would be enough, but that sounds like so very little.  Anyone got experience with this or know how much data per month I might need?
